body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Under certain conditions, user would want to fail a workflow (instead of keep retrying), and later rerun those failed workflows. 

**Describe the solution you'd like**
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.
The tctl batch command to support rerun (or reset) as an action.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.
User could build their own solution to query the failed workflows, and then rerun them 1 by 1. 

**Additional context**
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
Would be good to have a way to know the progress of the batch operation.

comments.body: Batch reset failed workflow to its first task will do the same.

title: Batch operation to restart failed workflows
